::KitKat::
She looked at the bat probe and then to blacknightmare. "Ah, well if 
your friend there can cover the signal, then I shall speak to your 
comander. Tell DarkFate that if he can, I will need himand his forces 
to come to my base. Once we get all our troops together, we shall 
advance and attack the Allience."

She then opened a link to Megatron. "Megatron. Please, bring your 
forces back to our base. I have good news for you about our plans."

She cut off her link. Looking at blacknightmare,"Well then, I have a 
few other things to attend to. Please make yourselves at home here 
untill your master arrives. I shall see you later on."

KitKat left the room.

Diamond::
She saw KitKat walk out. "Ah, KitKat, if you have a moment, I need to 
speak to you."

KitKat::
She sighed. It seamed that everyone bot on the planet needed to speak 
to her. "Alright. What is it?"

Diamond::
"In private commander, if you please?"

KitKat::
She sighed and walked into a small conference room with Diamond and 
closed the door behind her. "Now what is it that you wish to speak to 
me about?"

Diamond::
She stood next to KitKat, grinning slightly. "Well, it is about a 
transmission I over heard from the Allience base."

KitKat::
"Really? That's excellent. I shall reward you well for this. What was 
the transmission?"
